history.text: Hey there
hi
I kind of felt bad for loving this movie, ya know really rooting for the bad guy in a sense.
so i really didn't like this movie. I thought that it was very shallow in its story.
I know what you mean. But i feel bad that i have to root for the bad guy because the good guy is not good enough...
Plus it just felt like it was done before.
It was wall Street broker = bad. But it really romanticised the 80s at te same time
yeah
liek that "greed is good" film
i know what you mean
But looking back that was a huge cast.
the text echoes the shallow remark, saying, claustrophobically narrow in scope."
they really aren't the people that i like to see though. Maybe because it was i am more into sci-fi movies, but this movie really didn't do it for me.
well, compare them this way. Both feature over the top villains
c'mon help me out here. Did you even see it.

yeah, but i have a hard time believing the villains when they are placed in a real world setting. If i see them in a sci-fi world then my mind tells me that everything here is not real and i can accept that. When over-the-top things are placed in the real world, i just can't get past it.
That is interesting. Is this just like a "don't remind me, I'm here to get away from all that real life stuff"
pretty much.
That is why I like sci fi best to.
it is strange, i like both types of moves and shows. but when they cross paths i have a hard time with it.
yeah i really dont want to relax in the real world. i want to be taken away to an imaginary place.
This wallstreet stuff happens all the time. It is not that interesting to me
One of the ways I relate to it was that in my restaurant biz, I met a lot of showy, suddenly wealthy investors nad they were sort of unlikable.
so you are living the movie all the time then.
nothing new really.
boy, am I not living THAT movie
Some people really get a kick out of the super audacious scam/con
im sure you aren't. you know what i mean though. it is just not THAT out of the ordinary to really grab me.
yeah. i can see how that is the case.
especially after the scores that it got.
not too bad.
You have a very high tolerance for bad or a very low opinion of the world and it's ways. I get it.
lets just call it alternative

OK, people often tell me I have a touch of that.
\
I lived in cities all my life and there are a lot of wanna be New York sharpies.
Anyway the movie plays yto a certain code that the world rewards bad behavior with bad consequences which is a moral tone that a lot of sci fi uses.
true

uid2response.feedback: near unresponsive partner. Lots of one word answers. had to carry conversation solo.
